import React from "react"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const ProductScreen = (props) => { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • price : ${product.price}
  • Descriprion :

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); }; export default ProductScreen;
